WorkItem.Description:
Create a RowDetailsTemlate like this
             <Custom:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
                <DataTemplate>
                      <Button Content="Right Aligned" Width="60" Height="30" HorizontalAlignment="Right"/>
                </DataTemplate>
            </Custom:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
Now, make sure the details are visible and resize the grid to reduce the width. The Button goes out of view. Increase the width again and the Button still does not appear. The whole client area for rowdetails is increased permanently.
This is still a bug in Feb 2010 release.
WorkItem.Summary: Right-aligned content of DataGrid's RowDetails scrolls out of view when the grid is resized

Comments.Message:
Ahh, fortunately there is a solution to this hideous problem. Disable horizontal scroll bar in datagrid 

HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Disabled"
